channel.title: [Crash] Surface Tension
channel.description: At the point when the Apache comes up guns blazing the game crashes and gives the following error: "Can't load lump 53, allocation of 6789549 bytes failed!!!" I'll test is again tomorrow, to see if I get the error again. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T22_8_24C0.mdmp (96.2 KB)

item.title: [Crash] Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: Flarekitsu
item.description:
I got a crash here too. Firing at the Apache with the RPG, then suddenly a full on driver crash. No problems until I fought the helicopter.

Sigh. Maybe when the Steam version comes out and the devs can roll out fixes, I’ll get this again. Until then it’s just too buggy on my computer to run effectively.

Read full topic

item.title: [Crash] Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: andred
item.description:
I got something like this once in around then, could not replicate.

Read full topic

item.title: [Crash] Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: angelofdeath1000
item.description:
At the point when the Apache comes up guns blazing the game crashes and gives the following error:

“Can’t load lump 53, allocation of 6789549 bytes failed!!!”

I’ll test is again tomorrow, to see if I get the error again.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T22_8_24C0.mdmp (96.2 KB)
